mapper.select: select ur.id as id, ur.name as name, ur.description as description, ur.admin_count as admin_count, ur.create_time as create_time, ur.status as status, ur.sort as sort from ums_admin_role_relation uarr left join ums_admin ua on uarr.admin_id = ua.id left join ums_role ur on uarr.role_id = ur.id where admin_id = #{adminId}
